Verses: 1 en Aaththumaave, Karththarai Sthoththiri; En Muzhu Ullame, Avarudaiya Parisuththa Naamaththai Sthoththiri.
2 en Aaththumaave, Karththarai Sthoththiri; Avar Seydha Sagala Ubagaarangalaiyum Maravaadhe.
3 avar Un Akkiramangalaiyellaam Manniththu, Un Noigalaiyellaam Gunamaakki,
4 un Piraananai Azhivukku Vilakki Meettu, Unnai Kirubaiyinaalum Irakkangalinaalum Mudisootti,
5 nanmaiyinaal Un Vaayai Thirupthiyaakkugiraar; Kazhugukku Samaanamaai Un Vayadhu Thirumba Vaalavayadhu Polaagiradhu.
6 odukkappadugira Yaavarukkum, Karththar Needhiyaiyum Niyaayaththaiyum Seygiraar.
7 avar Thamadhu Vazhigalai Mosekkum, Thamadhu Kiriyaigalai Isravel Puththirarukkum Theriyappanninaar.
8 karththar Urukkamum, Irakkamum, Neediya Saandhamum, Migundha Kirubaiyumullavar.
9 avar Eppozhudhum Kadindhukollaar; Endraikkum Kobankondiraar.
10 avar Nammudaiya Paavangalukkuththakkadhaaga Namakku Seyyaamalum, Nammudaiya Akkiramangalukku Thakkadhaaga Namakku Sarikkattaamalum Irukkiraar.
11 boomikku Vaanam Evvalavu Uyaramaayirukkiradho, Avarukku Bayappadugiravargalmel Avarudaiya Kirubaiyum Avvalavu Peridhaayirukkiradhu.
12 merkukkum Kizhakkukkum Evvalavu Dhooramo, Avvalavu Thooramaai Avar Nammudaiya Paavangalai Nammai Vittu Vilakkinaar.
13 thagappan Than Pillaigalukku Irangugiradhupola, Karththar Thamakku Bayandhavargalukku Irangugiraar.
14 nammudaiya Uruvam Innadhendru Avar Arivaar; Naam Mannendru Ninaivukoorugiraar.
15 manushanudaiya Naatkal Pullukku Oppaayirukkiradhu; Veliyin Pushpaththaippol Pookkiraan.
16 kaatru Adhinmel Veesinavudane Adhu Illaamarpoyitru; Adhu Irundha Idamum Ini Adhai Ariyaadhu.
17 karththarudaiya Kirubaiyo Avarukku Bayandhavargalmelum, Avarudaiya Needhi Avargal Pillaigaludaiya Pillaigalmelum Anaadhiyaai Endrendraikkum Ulladhu.
18 avarudaiya Udanpadikkaiyai Kaikkondu, Avarudaiya Kattalaigalinpadi Seyya Ninaikkiravargal Meleye Ulladhu.
19 karththar Vaanangalil Thamadhu Singaasanaththai Sthaabiththirukkiraar; Avarudaiya Raajarigam Sarvaththaiyum Aalugiradhu.
20 karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaikkettu, Avarudaiya Vasanaththinpadi Seygira Balaththa Savuriyavaangalaagiya Avarudaiya Thoodhargale, Avarai Sthoththiriyungal.
21 karththarukku Piriyamaanadhai Seydhu, Avar Panividaikkaararaayirukkira Avarudaiya Sarvasenaigale, Avarai Sthoththiriyungal.
22 karththar Aalugira Evvidangalilumulla Avarudaiya Sagala Kiriyaigale, Avarai Sthoththiriyungal; En Aaththumaave Karththaraisthoththiri.
